summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 8%).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), dew point temperature (up 2.7°C), and feels like temperature (down 1.8°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 332m to 1648m and averaged 1268.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; sweltering, especially in sunny spots. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and breezy at times. Chance of light rain, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. Weather patterns to stay the same.
